= HTML Graphs Visualization Generator <sup><font color=gray size="1">since 1.1.4</font></sup>=

The main idea of this feature is to generate a simple HTML page in order to visualize any graphs generated by JMeter or JMeter Plugins.
It's easy to use, simply execute the html-graphviz-generator.cmd (or .sh for UNIX), then open the newly generated index-graphviz.html file.

The images directory can be specified in the jmeter.properties file, it is set to JMETER_HOME/bin by default:

#jmeterPlugin.gvg.imageDirectory=D:/outils/jmeter/apache-jmeter-2.11/bin/images

You can also indicate the directory by editing the html-graphviz-generator script and adding -DjmeterPlugin.gvg.imageDirectory=D:/outils/jmeter/apache-jmeter-2.11/bin/images to the command line.
